subject: Track and Field
Heptathlon
lead_paragraph: Ashton Eaton successfully defended his heptathlon world indoor championship title Saturday in Sopot, Poland, but a world record escaped him by just 1.18 seconds over the closing 1,000 meters.
snippet: Ashton Eaton successfully defended his heptathlon world indoor championship title Saturday in Sopot, Poland, but a world record escaped him by just 1.18 seconds over the closing 1,000 meters.
